transcript.text: great moments are born from great
opportunity and that's what you have
here today that's what you've earned
here today one chance if we fought them
ten times they might win nine
but not this fight not today today we
challenge censorship today we say no
more we shut them down because we can
today we are the greatest movement in
the world you were born to be citizen
journalists every one of you and you
were meant to be here today this is your
time their time it's done it's over I'm
sick and tired of hearing about how bad
the world is my pessimists forget him
now is your time
go out there and take it
stop it come along where free speech
makes the stand
